viewAccountSignin.otpInput: Input the six-digit code provided by the Google Authenticator app
viewAccountSignin.title: Login

viewAccountVerificationcenter.desc1: After the verification, users will be level 2 and can start trade BTC
viewAccountVerificationcenter.desc2: After verification complete, you can use currency deposit and withdraw.
viewAccountVerificationcenter.title: Verification Center

viewAccountVerificationform.passportFileDesc1: 1.clear photo or scan of the document
viewAccountVerificationform.passportFileDesc2: 2.valid ID documents, within its expiry date
viewAccountVerificationform.prootOfResidencyFileDesc1: 1. Bills of water, gas, electricity and credit card within 3 months are acceptable while ID card, international passport, social insurance card, driving license, and express paper are not;
viewAccountVerificationform.prootOfResidencyFileDesc2: 2. No electronic bills/statements, online screenshots, mobile phone bills;
viewAccountVerificationform.prootOfResidencyFileDesc3: 3. Clear photo or scan of a paper document;
viewAccountVerificationform.prootOfResidencyFileDesc4: 4. High quality image (color, 300dpi resolution or higher);
viewAccountVerificationform.prootOfResidencyFileDescTitle: To verify your account please submit a proof of residency document issued within the last 3 months and including your name and address, that meets the following qualifications.
viewAccountVerificationform.title: Authentication Request

viewMainMain.slogan5: Easy to install and easy to install BitCoin solution,
viewMainMain.title: Main

viewTradeBuybtc.buyOrderDesc9: Click Buy to complete your order
viewTradeBuybtc.title: Buy Bitcoin
viewTradeBuybtc.tradeUpdateDesc: (단, 수정 중 주문이 전부 체결되었거나 부분 체결되었을 경우 수정이 자동 취소됩니다.)

viewWalletBtcWithdraw.firstDesc1: Withdrawal from Site wallet to your external wallet
viewWalletBtcWithdraw.firstDesc2: The fee will be automaticaly deducted from your Coin Balance
viewWalletBtcWithdraw.secondDesc1: COIN withdrawal will be processed as soon as possible after admin approved
viewWalletBtcWithdraw.secondDesc2: Make sure the bitcoin address is correct
viewWalletBtcWithdraw.secondDesc3: You must have done E-mail verification for BTC withdrawal
viewWalletBtcWithdraw.secondDesc4: First BTC withdrawal may ask needed document for avoiding fraud
viewWalletBtcWithdraw.title: BTC Withdrawal

viewWalletDeposit.guideFirst1: In order to fund your BTC account, please send BTC to the address below
viewWalletDeposit.guideFirst2: The amount you send will be automatically credited to your account after your transaction receives 1 confirmations on the Blockchain
viewWalletDeposit.title: BTC Deposit

viewWalletKrwDeposit.depositorNamePlaceHolder: Depositor Name have to be match
viewWalletKrwDeposit.guideFirst1: To buy BTC from Site, you should deposit KRW
viewWalletKrwDeposit.guideFirst2: Please deposit KRW to our account below
viewWalletKrwDeposit.guideSecond1: 1. Account Name must match your registerd name
viewWalletKrwDeposit.guideSecond2: 2. Your account will be credited as soon as the funds are received
viewWalletKrwDeposit.guideThird1: KRW points will be convert 1:1 with KRW deposit
viewWalletKrwDeposit.title: KRW Deposit

viewWalletKrwWithdraw.firstDesc1: You can withdrawal KRW credited on your account
viewWalletKrwWithdraw.firstDesc2: Account information must match your registered information
viewWalletKrwWithdraw.secondDesc1: KRW withdrawal will be processed within 24hrs after admin approved
viewWalletKrwWithdraw.secondDesc2: You must have done E-mail verification for KRW withdrawal
viewWalletKrwWithdraw.secondDesc3: First KRW withdrawal may ask needed document for avoiding fraud
viewWalletKrwWithdraw.secondDesc4: It can be dealyed due to bank system error
viewWalletKrwWithdraw.title: KRW Withdrawal
